greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: number of series-reduced labeled graphs on n nodes with k components.
formula: T(n,k) = Sum_{Compositions n=n_1+n_2+...n_k, n_i>=1} multinomial(n; n_1,n_2,..,n_k) * T(n_1,1) * T(n_2,1) *... T(n_k,1)/ k!.
results.author: _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 29 2019
